name: SQLServerBackup
short_description:
This is a total backup solution for Microsoft SQL Server 2008/R2, not tested against 2005/2012 sql server. 

It includes jobs for creating a weekly full backup, everyday differential backup and a 30 minute transaction log backup. 

You won't need to use "maintenance task" - this backup routine includes multiple error detections which a maintenance task will fail upon.

The backup routines will be easily configurable in an logical way through a table in the msdb database, and also through the scheduled tasks.

The jobs are based upon 3 stored procedures (BackupFull, BackupDiffs and BackupLogs) in the msdb database. The HVIBackupFull stored procedure will take a backup of all databases if no database name is supplied in the name parameter. It will compress/split the backup if defined in the HVIConfig file.
summary: Sql Server 2008/R2 backup scripts for high availability
